mapper.update:
update ydz_installation_order
INSTALLATION_NO = #{installationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_KEY = #{comKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_KEY = #{partnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_SHORTNAME = #{partnerShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CASE_DESC = #{caseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_RATE = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREFERENTIAL = #{preferential,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREPAY_PRICE = #{prepayPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYABLE_PRICE = #{payablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSTALLATION_PRICE = #{installationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where COM_KEY = #{comKey}
and INSTALLATION_NO = #{installationNo}

update ydz_installation_order set INSTALLATION_NO = #{installationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_KEY = #{comKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_KEY = #{partnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_SHORTNAME = #{partnerShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CASE_DESC = #{caseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_RATE = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREFERENTIAL = #{preferential,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREPAY_PRICE = #{prepayPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYABLE_PRICE = #{payablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSTALLATION_PRICE = #{installationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
